column4: Data charts are specified as the type of evidence appropriate for assessing achievement of a goal or short-term objective.
Observation log is specified as the type of evidence appropriate for assessing achievement of a goal or short-term objective.
The type of evidence appropriate for assessing achievement of a goal or short-term objective is in a category not yet defined in CEDS.
Tests are specified as the type of evidence appropriate for assessing achievement of a goal or short-term objective.
